description:
QQ -- Fun to chat

### Note

This package installs/upgrades the **Tencent QQ** (腾讯QQ).

**Tencent QQ** displays Simplified Chinese only. For other languages, please switch to **Tentcent QQ International** (腾讯QQ国际版).

### What's installed

After installation. There will be two new entries in `Programs and Features`:

* **腾讯QQ** (Tencent QQ): Major Tencent QQ program.
* **Tencent QQMail Plugin**: This plugin helps user upload large file (more than 1GB) in [QQ Mail](https://en.mail.qq.com/).

> [What is Tencent QQMail plugin ? (Chinese Language)](https://kf.qq.com/faq/161227jeAFZB161227jaEzIR.html)

### AutoHotKey script

AutoHotKey script `chocolateyuninstall.ahk` will help you to close the uninstaller message box. Install Package **AutoHotkey (Portable)** is recommended (not necessary).

### Uninstallation

The Script `chocolateyuninstall.ps1` removes Major **Tencent QQ** program only.

**Tencent QQMail Plugin** can't be removed automatically because the uninstaller is not exist. You can remove this manually in `Programs and Features` anytime.
author: Tencent
